FADE
IN:
EXT.
CITY
CENTRE
-
NIGHT
A
ruined
city.
THE
MARINER
charges
in.
CUT
TO:
EXT.RUDDY& GREENEBUILDING- FRONT- NIGHT
Gunshots
echo.
ROSE
Where are we?
MARINER
Move.
INT.RUDDY& GREENBUILDING- ELEVATOR
They enter.
INT.11THFLOOR- CONTINUOUS
Mariner kicks the door.
SALVATORI
Stop!
MARINER
No.
EXT.
DOCKS
-
DAWN
The
Mariner
waits.
FIN
